query: My dashboard should show a summary first, then expand to show all charts.
expected_behavior: Widget starts inline. Uses displayMode + requestDisplayMode from useWidget. Provides expand button to fullscreen and collapse button to return. User-triggered switching only.

query: Building a language learning flashcard game. Needs to stay visible while chatting.
expected_behavior: Suggests PiP mode. Uses requestDisplayMode('pip'). Notes PiP coerces to fullscreen on mobile. Widget stays visible during conversation.

query: Just need to show order confirmation with a tracking number.
expected_behavior: Inline mode (default) is sufficient. No display mode switching needed. Simple card widget. Max 2 CTAs.

query: Widget looks jarring when ChatGPT is in dark mode.
expected_behavior: Uses theme from useWidget(). Shows conditional styling. Both inline styles and Tailwind approaches.

query: I want dates formatted for the user's language.
expected_behavior: Uses locale from useWidget(). Shows Intl.DateTimeFormat(locale) for formatting.

query: My complex grid doesn't work on phones.
expected_behavior: Uses userAgent.device.type from useWidget(). Shows conditional layout: mobile gets list view, desktop gets grid.

query: My widget content gets cut off at the bottom on phones with notches.
expected_behavior: Uses safeArea.insets from useWidget(). Applies insets as padding. Also uses maxHeight to constrain widget height.
